column1: (†) indicates the presence of a P-21 Remarks: Lockheed Martin is currently the industry source that is both facilitized and qualified to produce the GMLRS rocket. FY19 and FY20 annual production contracts are options on the FY18 base contract. FY21 annual production is planned to be an Indefinite Delivery Indefinite Quantity (IDIQ) contract type. FY22 annual production is planned to be a lot buy against the FY21 contract. *Sole Source/Fixed Price Incentive Firm **Aviation and Missile Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama
